analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive theme related to black holes. The existing files do not reflect any thematic elements or animations that could enhance the user experience. The theme should incorporate cosmic and black hole-related visuals, animations, and interactive elements to align with the event's focus.

improvements.description: Add a cosmic-themed background with animated stars and a central black hole animation. Include sections for black hole information and interactive elements.
Implement a dark color palette with gradients representing space. Add CSS animations for stars twinkling and a rotating black hole effect.
Create JavaScript functions to animate the black hole and stars. Add interactivity such as hover effects on black hole information sections.
